// src/utils/loadJsonData.js
export function loadJsonDataFiles(){const context=require.context('../data',false,/\.json$/);return context.keys().map(key=>({...context(key),filename:key}));}export function loadUniqueUuids(){const dataFiles=loadJsonDataFiles();const uniqueUuids=Array.from(new Set(dataFiles.map(file=>file.uuid)));return uniqueUuids.map(uuid=>{return dataFiles.find(file=>file.uuid===uuid);});}export function loadJsonDataByMode(mode){const dataFiles=loadJsonDataFiles();return dataFiles.find(file=>file.mode===mode);}export function loadJsonFileCount(){const context=require.context('../data',false,/\.json$/);return context.keys().length;}
